metadata.title: CVE-2016-8688 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - low
metadata.description:
The mtree bidder in libarchive 3.2.1 does not keep track of line sizes whenextending the read-ahead, which allows remote attackers to cause a denialof service (crash) via a crafted file, which triggers an invalid read inthe (1) detect_form or (2) bid_entry function inlibarchive/archive_read_support_format_mtree.c.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-8688` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

bsdcpio - 3.1.2-11ubuntu0.16.04.3
bsdtar - 3.1.2-11ubuntu0.16.04.3
libarchive13 - 3.1.2-11ubuntu0.16.04.3
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libarchive package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '3.1.2-11ubuntu0.16.04.3').
